author: Chris Welch
title: Apple’s future AirPods roadmap just leaked, and big changes are coming
description: Apple plans to launch two pairs of fourth-generation AirPods in 2024 to better differentiate the various models in its lineup. New AirPods Max and Pros are also in the pipeline.
content:
